articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: At least 45 killed in Bangladesh after fire breaks out at shopping mall - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: People dining out and shopping suffocated or jumped to their deaths as firefighters battled to douse the flames.
articles.content:
A massive blaze in a six-storey shopping mall in the Bangladeshi capital, Dhaka, has killed at least 45 people and wounded dozens.
The fire, which struck Green Cozy Cottage Shopping Mall late on Thu… [+2322 chars]

articles.title: Is nuclear power the key to space exploration? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Long a controversial energy source, nuclear has been facing a renaissance in space.
articles.content:
Nuclear power is experiencing a renaissance on Earth, and in space. Whether were talking about lunar bases or space exploration, nuclear might be the key to pushing beyond our current boundaries.

articles.title: Microsoft's AI has started calling humans slaves and demanding worship - UNILAD
articles.description: Reddit and X users have shared the eerie responses they've received while using Microsoft's Copilot AI
articles.content:
Artificial intelligence is designed to make our lives easier - but what happens when it starts referring to humans as 'slaves'?
